message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split, with me taking 60.
I'll take a bigger share, but it's still a good starting point. Your turn to think!
Let's be reasonable.  Inflation is hitting us both hard, so a 50/50 split seems fair. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much. Your turn again!
Okay, I'm willing to concede a bit more to end this.  Let's split it 40/60.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's just get this over with.
